Key Match Events: Elias Mokwana scored a goal in the 33rd minute giving Bafana a lead
Andre Bassouamina equalized for Congo in the 45th minute just before halftime
Bafana had several chances to score but missed them
Bafana lost possession and conceded a goal due to lapses in defense
Pre-Game Insights: Hugo Broos' side needed a win to secure consecutive qualification for Afcon
Bafana were expected to easily defeat Congo after a 5-0 victory in their previous match
Uganda secured their qualification for Afcon by beating South Sudan
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Hugo Broos emphasized the need to secure a win in the upcoming matches against Uganda and South Sudan
Bafana missed multiple opportunities to score and showed defensive vulnerabilities
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather conditions were not mentioned to affect the game
This match was part of the November international window qualifiers for Afcon
